ComicInfo.Summary: Jericho's Rose Part 2: Jennifer and Tefé travel into the Green to locate and retrieve Levi. Meanwhile, Harper Pilgrim has been possessed by the Pale Pilgrim and plans a machine-based parliament to take it's place with the Green, the Red, and the Rot. In Detroit, Jack Hawksmoor faces the early stages of the Parliament of Gears and is rescued by Levi.
ComicInfo.Tags: Detroit,Jack Hawksmoor,Levi Kamei,Floronic Man,Jennifer Reece,Abby Holland,Trinity,Alec Holland,Pale Wanderer,Tefé Holland,Harper Pilgrim,John Constantine,New Mexico,India
ComicInfo.Title: Jericho's Rose Part 2
